Job Gym Employment Services – The BEST Jobs in Niagara! Skip to content VIRTUAL HUB: Online workshops, training & seminars! FREE!!! find me a job CONNECT job board BROWSE home page VISIT The health and safety of our clients and staff remain our top priority at the John Howard Society of Niagara. We are welcoming clients into our premises in controlled numbers and by appointment. In addition to scheduled in-person appointments, we will continue to provide virtual services by phone, email and video meetings. Clients will be able to choose how they want to be served by the John Howard Society of Niagara. Please contact us for more information: St. Catharines 905-682-2657 jobgym@jhs-niagara.ca Welland 905-732-7655 wellandjobgym@jhs-niagara.ca Fort Erie 905-871-3932 forteriejobgym@jhs-niagara.ca Niagara Falls 905-682-2657 jobgym@jhs-niagara.ca Job Gym is the Employment Services Division of The John Howard Society of Niagara. Home Record Suspensions Contact Us Customer Service Memberships Legal Disclaimer Privacy Policy OUR MISSION STATEMENT "Through responsive and individualized service, The John Howard Society of Niagara is committed to facilitating positive personal growth through Justice, Prevention, Employment and Education programs that enrich the communities of the Niagara Region." All content © Copyright Job Gym. All rights reserved. InstagramTwitterFacebook

Job Gym Employment Services – The BEST Jobs in Niagara! Skip to content VIRTUAL HUB: Online workshops, training & seminars! FREE!!! find me a job CONNECT job board BROWSE home page VISIT The health and safety of our clients and staff remain our top priority at the John Howard Society of Niagara. All of our staff have returned to our physical office locations in order to be readily available to assist the community with their needs. At the moment we still ask that if you require services, you follow the directions on the door at the location you are visiting. Walk-ins are being accepted with proper screening protocols in place. This is to control the number of people in our centers at any given time. We are offering a variety of ways to meet with staff; in person, telephone or video conferencing. This will be guided by your comfort level and the nature of your visit with us. Please click this link to view our screening protocols and what to expect during a visit to our centre.
